headline: VST Vs NRG: Which Energy Stock Should Belong to Your Portfolio Now?
summary: NRG Energy and Vistra continue to contribute to the ongoing transition in the energy sector. These utilities are actively shifting toward cleaner, more sustainable power sources.

headline: NRG CEO Larry Coben rides the power wave as the top performing stock in the S&P 500 for 2025
summary: NRG is doubling its natural gas-fired power plant fleet through acquisitions and preparing to thrive with or without the data center power boom.
